UniprotID	Q9HCQ5-2
Accession	Q9HCQ5;Q52LR8;Q6NT54;Q8NFR1
EntryName	GALT9_HUMAN
ProteinName	Polypeptide N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase 9 (EC 2.4.1.41) (Polypeptide GalNAc transferase 9) (GalNAc-T9) (pp-GaNTase 9) (Protein-UDP acetylgalactosaminyltransferase 9) (UDP-GalNAc:polypeptide N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase 9)
GeneName	GALNT9
Length	237
Function	Catalyzes the initial reaction in O-linked oligosaccharide biosynthesis, the transfer of an N-acetyl-D-galactosamine residue to a serine or threonine residue on the protein receptor. Does not glycosylate apomucin or SDC3.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane
